=========
Speedtime
=========

Command below is used to analyse csv files created from data taken on Picoscope. 


.. code-block:: bash
    :caption: Command

    isg.speedtime --file_name picodata.csv


Example ``.csv`` file is `pico_data.csv <_static/files/speedtime/pico_data.csv>`_.


Output filtered speed is populated in ``output_speedtime.csv``. 
Plot is saved in folder named "isg_plots" created at location of terminal. 

.. image:: _static/images/speedtime.png
